entry.title: Saturday night: Blowing snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Blowing snow this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:06 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 24.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 24. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 5:06 PM CST Saturday 21 January 2023
